products.title: Alan Wake
products.description: A psychological thriller where a writer battles a darkness that brings his nightmares to life. Explore a mysterious small town with a flashlight as your main weapon.

specs.Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 / AMD Radeon R7 260x

products.title: Dying Light
products.description: Survive in a city devastated by a mysterious virus that turns people into zombies. Use parkour to navigate the urban environment and craft weapons to fight the infected.

specs.Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560 / AMD Radeon HD 6870

products.title: Human Fall Flat
products.description: A hilarious, physics-based puzzle platformer where you control wobbly humans in surreal dreamscapes. Solve puzzles alone or with friends in this creative sandbox.

specs.Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 / AMD Radeon HD 5850

products.title: Clair Obscur: Expedition
products.description: Embark on a mysterious expedition into the unknown, where light and shadow play crucial roles in survival. Uncover ancient secrets in this atmospheric adventure game.

specs.Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 580

products.title: V Rising
products.description: Awaken as a weakened vampire after centuries of slumber and survive in a world full of danger. Hunt for blood, rebuild your castle, and convert humans into loyal servants.

specs.Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti / AMD Radeon R7 360

products.title: The Incredible Adventures of Van Helsing
products.description: Step into the shoes of the famous monster hunter's son in this action-RPG set in a gothic-noir world. Battle supernatural foes with weapons and magic in Borgovia.

specs.Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo / AMD Athlon 64 X2

products.title: TransOcean - The Shipping Company
products.description: Build your own shipping empire in this business simulation game. Manage fleets, establish routes, and compete against rival companies in the global maritime trade.

specs.Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo / AMD Athlon 64 X2

products.title: The Thaumaturge
products.description: Explore a mystical version of 1905 Warsaw as a thaumaturge, a person with the ability to see and control supernatural beings called Salutors. Solve mysteries and face moral dilemmas.

specs.Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 580

products.title: Iron Harvest
products.description: Command giant dieselpunk mechs in this alternate history RTS set in the 1920s. Experience an epic single-player campaign, multiplayer combat, and challenge modes.

specs.Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 770 / AMD Radeon R9 280

products.title: Red Orchestra 2: Heroes of Stalingrad
products.description: Experience the brutal Eastern Front of World War II in this realistic first-person shooter. Lead infantry and tank crews through the Battle of Stalingrad with authentic weapons and tactics.

specs.Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo / AMD Athlon 64 X2

products.title: Dark Souls II
products.description: Prepare to die again in this brutal action RPG. Face relentless enemies and epic boss battles as you journey through a dark fantasy world. Every victory is hard-earned in this challenging adventure.

specs.Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 465 / ATI Radeon HD 6870

products.description: Experience the emotional journey of Ellie in a post-apocalyptic world ravaged by infected humans. This remastered version features enhanced graphics, new game modes, and additional content.

specs.Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 SUPER / AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT
